title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters dialog
OB: Default values are not shown in the Show Report Parameters dialog.
EB: The Show Report Parameters dialog should display the default values of the report parameters.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create several report parameters and set default values for them. 2. Drag the parameters to the layout. 3. Open the Show Report Parameters dialog.
